meanings.definition: The act of forming a braid by intertwining three or more strands of material.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed plaiting her hair in different styles.
meanings.sent2: Her plaiting skills improved with practice.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted plaiting its tail with a piece of string.
meanings.sent4: The plaiting of stories in the book created a beautiful narrative.
meanings.sent5: The intricate plaiting of the basket made it sturdy and unique.

meanings.definition: The result of intertwining strands of material to form a braid.
meanings.sent1: The intricate plaiting looked beautiful in her hair.
meanings.sent2: The plaiting was done neatly and securely.
meanings.sent3: The plaiting of spaghetti strands amused the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: The plaiting of melodies in the song created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The colorful plaiting of ribbons added a festive touch to the gift.
